description.value:
There is a taint in your blood that is both alien and bizarre. When you bloodrage, this manifests in peculiar and terrifying ways.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{Improved Disarm},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{Improved Grapple},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{Improved Unarmed Strike},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{Enlarge Person} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{See Invisibility} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{Displacement} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{Black Tentacles} (16th)
